mention.text: Slovenia , the most prosperous of Yugoslavia 's six republics
the most prosperous of Yugoslavia 's six republics
the prosperous northern republic of Slovenia
the Slovenian declaration from federal authorities
the Declaration of Sovereignty of the State of Slovenia
the first free state elections held in Communist-ruled Yugoslavia in 45 years
neighboring Italy and Austria , replacing border guards deployed for the past 45 years by Yugoslavia 's Communist government
